description: A new access model for Gitlab SaaS which leverages RBAC managed via the IDAM service to make access management more efficient, effective and to support inner sourcing across the organisation.

AppSec templates are extensions of Gitlab templates with a few additions, customizations and improvements.
A transit gateway works across AWS accounts, and you can use AWS RAM to share your transit gateway with other accounts.
A method to find the correct ENV endpoints for service-service communications and how multiple envs (sit/uat/etc) can be overlayed on to the existing TLD.

Common Environment definitions, usages and network communication
Release management refers to the process of planning, designing, scheduling, testing, deploying, and controlling software releases.
AWS Foundations PKI - a centrally managed solution to issue and manage certificates for William Hill.
Trace data and metrics collected from your applications and infrastructure using the OpenTelemetry protocol.
Argo CD is a declarative, GitOps continuous delivery tool for Kubernetes.
Automated dependency updates for a variety of platforms and languages.
